relnotes.name: ETel SIM Toolkit
relnotes.purpose: ETel extensions, SAT API offers access to the (U)SIM Application Toolkit feature

defect.title: MMS Notification Download & USSD Data Download APIs in ETelSAT to be modified

deliverystep.name: PREQ2064: Submission of UICC Server Mode
deliverystep.preq: Added ETel support for UICC Server mode as introduced by ETSI TS 102 223 Release 7.

relnotes.preq: Added ETel support for 3GPP R6 USAT

defect.title: 3G/USIM specific elementary files are missing from Etelsat.h

relnotes.defect: Updated list of files that can be refreshed via REFRESH proactive command with 3GPP R5 files.

cr.title: Preventing of FDN check if request has proactive origin

relnotes.cr: No FDN check if request has proactive origin

cr.title: Implement missing R5 functionality in EtelSat

relnotes.cr: Mising R5 Text attribute functionality has been added to EtelSat API
relnotes.defect: Added new API RSat::GetOpenChannelPCmd for use when a client wishes to be notifed of any open channel

cr.title: Add PREQ1234 to the scope of Bravo

relnotes.cr: Removed the need to have the SYMBIAN_TELEPHONY_USAT5 system-wide #define in order to enable (U)SAT R5 support

defect.title: TIdleModeText needs to support 8-bit and 16-bit encoding
